name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/FmohNHaso0

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Shanghai Qineng Oriental Foreign Languages School owed workers wages. When the workers demanded their wages, the principal refused to pay them (threatening to make trouble and report to the municipal bureau). The workers surrounded the finance department's work car, slammed the car, and were later arrested and taken to a detention center.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 1, it was reported that Chuanyanba Primary School in Longtang Town, Shiqian County, Guizhou Province, was officially named: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army Guizhou Shiqian Kunniushan Red Army School. Currently, there are 20 Red Army Primary Schools in Guizhou Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Chinese media reported that "my country's reusable experimental spacecraft successfully landed" but there were no relevant photos, only a picture with the words "too advanced to be displayed"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 8, Qingdao, Shandong, urban management officers burst all the balloons of street vendors.
September 8, Chongqing. Urban management officers threw all the vendors’ vegetables into the law enforcement vehicle, regardless of the vendors’ pleas.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 7, Suihua, Heilongjiang. The Internet exposed that at Anda High School, a teacher slapped several girls on the podium and repeatedly emphasized "rural children" and "Are you a rural child?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 8, the media reported that the restrictions on foreign investment access in the manufacturing industry have been "cleared", which means that foreign and domestic investment will enjoy the same treatment in the access link of the manufacturing industry.
The Ministry of Commerce, the National Health Commission, and the National Medical Products Administration: It is planned to allow the establishment of wholly foreign-owned hospitals in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen and other places.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, blogger "t0mbkeeper" posted on Weibo that if Weibo did not give him advertising revenue, he could report Weibo for embedding the Japanese flag in the app. Weibo then officially released a statement saying that the blogger only joined the sharing plan in September, so he had no revenue in August. Then the red icon of Weibo's zero revenue was changed to blue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a large number of videos about "sons ignoring their parents' opposition and resolutely going to the army" have appeared on social platforms, and even the lines are almost exactly the same.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 7, the Economic Daily reported: "We should be rational about the increase in medical insurance premiums. The increase in premiums is to ensure sufficient funds and is in line with actual needs." This triggered a lot of ridicule from netizens, who replied, "If we control the medical insurance expenses of the senior cadres, there will be no need to increase them every year."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 7, economic expert Cai Fang said at the Bund Financial Summit: The elderly population cannot be viewed as a burden, but this group must be transformed into human resources and consumers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was reported online that Song Yulei, the class leader of the safety engineering major at Taiyuan University of Technology, had a dispute with the school's Youth League Committee Secretary and two other students at work. Afterwards, the three of them jointly verbally abused and retaliated against Song Yulei, causing the exhausted Song Yulei to jump off the building and die in the early morning of August 30.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 7, Ziyang, Sichuan. A head of a family posted a video complaining about the poor dormitory conditions of a high school in Anyue County. To this, a netizen replied, "How can they give a lot of money to foreigners when their own children have such a simple accommodation environment?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After China announced the suspension of international adoptions, relevant staff revealed that the fate of hundreds of orphans who were delayed in the adoption process due to the epidemic has been changed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The entry for "generosity disease" was deleted by Baidu Encyclopedia, which displays "Sorry, the page you visited does not exist"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 5, five departments issued the "Personal Help-Seeking Online Service Platform Management Measures" to provide an online platform for individuals whose families are in financial difficulties due to illness or other reasons to publish help-seeking information and collect donation funds. The measures stipulate that the personal help-seeking online platform must be designated by the Ministry of Civil Affairs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 7, Weihai, Shandong. A man posted a video saying that his mother was an outstanding party member who had studied at the Party School and made outstanding contributions to China's taxation and retirement work throughout her life. As a result, his mother died suddenly in the community for no reason recently. Since there was no surveillance record, the man believed that the property should bear the corresponding responsibility, and said that the funeral home charged unreasonable fees, and suspected that his mother's death was related to the drugs purchased on the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 7, the Guizhou Provincial People's Government approved the establishment of eight new toll stations, which were put into operation on time to collect vehicle tolls after passing the acceptance test. This triggered boycotts and dissatisfaction among netizens, with one netizen replying, "The money has been wasted, and extortion is inevitable!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 8 (Released) Jinan, Shandong. A woman said that her daughter was studying at Zhangqiu Bilingual School. During her time at school, her daughter was bullied by her deskmate, who stabbed her hundreds of times with an iron spike. The pictures showed that her daughter's legs were covered with needle holes, which was shocking. Her little finger was also deformed by being hit with a hammer by her deskmate. Afterwards, the school teacher protected her. The deskmate also claimed that his father knew the principal and threatened her daughter not to tell her parents about the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 8, Shanghai: A truck overturned and crushed a small car while trying to avoid a left-turning vehicle at an intersection, killing five people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 7, Zhengzhou, Henan. The third phase of Sunac Airport Chenyuan was a shoddy project with serious reductions in specifications. The owners were defending their rights, and during the process, many owners were forcibly pushed into buses and taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 7, Shenzhen, Guangdong. A delivery boy on the roadside ate a few bites of white steamed buns, drank a few sips of water, and then left. This scene resonated with many netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The WeChat index related to "generosity disease" has soared 4100% in the past two days

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, an employee of an electric power company in Hainan was punished by the relevant department for sending a message in a group saying that Hainan had entered a power outage emergency state in the afternoon and that power outages could occur at any time. However, many Hainan residents said that their homes did have power outages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 7, Wenchang, Hainan. After the typhoon, trees were uprooted, doors and windows of houses were blown away, and the streets were in a mess, like a doomsday scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, Typhoon Makar made landfall in China, affecting Hainan, Guangxi and other places. Not only did classes at Shangsi Middle School in Fangchenggang, Guangxi not stop, but the principal also notified in the group that "the gate was blocked and students were not allowed to leave the school." Hainan University required students to return to school on the 9th. Students said that many dormitories had no water or electricity.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 7 (Release) Wu Yongqiang, a police officer of Shaanxi Public Security Department, reported Wang Xingning, secretary of Shaanxi Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection, for acting as a protective umbrella for evil forces. Wu Yongqiang said that he had reported to the relevant departments many times, but none of them were accepted. In August this year, he went to Qinhuangdao to report the problem to his superiors and was kidnapped and beaten by other police officers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 7, local high school students in Chongqing generally reported that they suddenly received a notice to start school. It is reported that due to the high temperature in recent days, the local schools in Chongqing were originally scheduled to start school on the 18th. However, on September 7, the local government suddenly notified that the school would start tomorrow. Because the high temperature in Chongqing is still continuing, it has aroused resistance from students, and there are even rumors that some students have jumped off the building due to excessive pressure.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 8, Global People, a magazine under the People's Daily, published an article criticizing the Internet celebrity for stopping Japanese people from taking photos in the Old Summer Palace. It also claimed that "national justice is not a traffic password" and "blind xenophobia has no soil in our country." At the same time, the article also confirmed the crimes such as sexual assault committed by the Internet celebrity while studying in the United States.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 8, Xi Jinping’s latest book, "On Education," was published.
